MESSAGES.GLOBAL__CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete this?
MESSAGES.HELP__PAGE_EXPLAIN_CONTENT:
This page lists your questions and answers quickly.

These list of questions have been automatically retrieved from mineweb.org, and is updated in real time.
MESSAGES.HELP__POST_TICKET_EXPLAIN: Post your question directly to the support. The ticket will be tracked on mineweb.org.
MESSAGES.HELP__POST_TICKET_CONTENT: Explain your problem as clearly as possible
MESSAGES.NOTIFICATION__DISPLAY_FROM: Show that notification comes from you
MESSAGES.NOTIFICATION__WHO: Who do you want to notify?
MESSAGES.NOTIFICATION__DELETE_ALL_FROM_ALL_USERS: Delete all notifications from all users
MESSAGES.ERROR__PLUGIN_REQUIREMENTS: Could not be installed: the prerequisites of the plugin have not been satisfied.
MESSAGES.ERROR__PLUGIN_NOT_VALID: The plugin is invalid, it can not be installed.
MESSAGES.ERROR__PLUGIN_SQL_INSTALLATION: An error occurred during SQL changes.
MESSAGES.ERROR__PLUGIN_PERMISSIONS: The plugin can not be installed/updated because the CMS does not have write permissions in the folder /app/Plugin/ (775 or 755).
MESSAGES.ERROR__CSRF: CSRF error occurred, refresh the page and try again.
MESSAGES.ERROR__DATABASE_TITLE: An error with the database has occurred!
MESSAGES.ERROR__DATABASE_CONTENT: Your database is either not set up or configured incorrectly. Edit /app/Config/database.php in order to change the database credentials and reload this page. If the problem persists, please contact support.
MESSAGES.ERROR__403_CONTENT: You are not allowed to access {URL}!
MESSAGES.ERROR__IP_WRONG: You do not have the same IP as when creating the database!
MESSAGES.GALLERY__PARAGRAPH: You have below the list of images that have already been registered on your site. You may reuse them.
MESSAGES.CONFIG__CONDITION: Put the link to the terms of service in order to activate this option. Please note, not all themes are compatible and may prevent registration.
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_EMAIL: Email to send emails to users
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_MONEY_NAME_PLURAL: Name of your currency in the plural
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_LANG: Choose the language of the CMS
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_EMAIL_SEND_TYPE: How would you like to send your emails?
MESSAGES.CONFIG__INFO_LANG: The footer (COPYRIGHT) must contain a link to mineweb.org or the configuration has not been saved (<a href="http://mineweb.org">mineweb.org</a>)
MESSAGES.CONFIG__ERROR_SAVE_LANG: The footer (COPYRIGHT) does not contain a link to mineweb.org, so the configuration has not been saved.
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_END_LAYOUT_COE: Code to add on each page (example: tawk.to scripts ...)
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_CONFIRM_MAIL_SIGNUP: Confirmation of the email at registration
MESSAGES.CONFIG__CONFIRM_MAIL_SIGNUP_EXPLAIN: At the registration, an email will be sent to the user, they will have to confirm it by clicking on the link received in the email. You can choose if the account is blocked or has the tag 'is not confirmed'
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_MEMBER_PAGE_TYPE_EXPLAIN: You can choose to view and load all of your members on the members page (heavy if a lot of subscribers) or to display a form to perform a quick search by nickname.
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_PASSWORDS_SALT: Do you want to use a salt?
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_PASSWORDS_ADVERTISSEMENT: Warning! By modifying these settings, the current passwords of your site will expire and will force your users to use the 'Forgotten Password' function
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_SESSION_TYPE_INFO: This is an advanced tuning of your site, you do not need to change it if you do not use it, by default the CMS uses PHP sessions.
MESSAGES.CONFIG__CHECK_UUID: Allow only premium users to register
MESSAGES.CONFIG__CHECK_UUID_CHANGE: As well as activating the UUID backup to automatically change the player's nickname?
MESSAGES.EMAIL__CONTENT_CONFIRM_MAIL:
Hi {USERNAME}!
You registered on {DATE} with IP {IP}, you have to confirm your email by going to this link {LINK}.


This email is automatic, please do not reply.

MESSAGES.INSTALL__STEP_1_DESC: You can now configure your Administrator account
MESSAGES.INSTALL__STEP_2_DESC: You have completed the installation of the CMS successfully! CMS configuration can be in the admin panel. Click the button below to switch to use.
MESSAGES.INSTALL__ALREADY_INSTALLED: Your site is already installed, if you want to reinstall it you must delete the file /config/install.txt and /config/installed.txt.
MESSAGES.INSTALL__NO_SKIP: You can not skip this step!
MESSAGES.INSTALL__TMP_NOT_WRITABLE: The folder where MineWeb is located is not available for writing, please change CHMOD to 755 on your folder containing MineWeb
MESSAGES.INSTALL__API_CONNECT_SUCCESS: The CMS has successfully connected to the API!

MESSAGES.PERMISSIONS__BYPASS_MAINTENANCE: To be able to view the site despite maintenance
MESSAGES.PERMISSIONS__MANAGE_CONFIGURATION: Manage the general preferences of the site
MESSAGES.PERMISSIONS__USE_ADMIN_HELP: To be able to use the part 'help' of the admin panel

MESSAGES.PERMISSIONS__MANAGE_THEMES: Manage themes of the site (activation, deactivation, deletion, installation, customization)
MESSAGES.PERMISSIONS__SEND_SERVER_COMMAND_FROM_DA: Send commands to the servers from the admin dashboard
MESSAGES.SERVER__TYPE_DEFAULT_INFOS: You need to install the MineWebBridge plugin on your server to use this type of link.All information related to this manipulation is available on documentation
MESSAGES.SERVER__TYPE_QUERY_INFOS: You do not need to install the MineWebBridge plugin on your server to use this type of link, this type of link only allows you to display the number of connected on your infrastructure. this manipulation are available on documentation
MESSAGES.SERVER__TYPE_RCON_INFOS:
The RCON protocol is available on all minecraft servers and allows to communicate with the site.To use this protocol you have to configure it in your server.properties:
  • Pass enable- rcon to true
  • Change rcon.password with a password
  • Change rcon. port with an available port
MESSAGES.SERVER__LINK_SUCCESS: The connection to the server has been established!
MESSAGES.SERVER__LINK_ERROR_ALREADY_LINKED: The server is already linked, type /mineweb reset to regenerate the link.

MESSAGES.UPDATE__AUTHORIZE_FORCED_UPDATE_EXPLAIN: Enables automatic updates. This is useful if a security patch is required or if a significant problem needs to be fixed.
MESSAGES.UPDATE__MAJOR_WARNING: The available update is an important update. Check your files before proceeding, as it could prevent some plugin/theme features from working properly.
MESSAGES.UPDATE__MAJOR_WARNING_EXTENSION: The available update is important. Check your files before proceeding, as it could prevent some plugin/theme features from working properly. Do you really want to update the CMS?
